title: Dungeon No Aru Sekai De Kashikoku Sukoyaka Ni Ikiru Houhou
alternative_title: ダンジョンのある世界で賢く健やかに生きる方法 ; How to Live Wisely and Healthily in a World with Dungeons
status: ダンジョンのある世界で賢く健やかに生きる方法 ; How to Live Wisely and Healthily in a World with Dungeons
description:
Description :
        Ten years ago, dungeons suddenly appeared all over the world. Yuma Minashiro fell into a dungeon on his way to a job interview. With no equipment and resigned to his death, Yuma obtained an incredible skill: summoning. It was tough because all the spirits he summoned were beautiful girls, and the only way to become stronger was to flirt with them, but he set up a company, made money, and lived a happy life as a dungeon explorer.
